title: Urgent - Land with House for Sale
details:
The house is located in a peaceful, residential area with close proximity to Wattala, Mahabage with easy access to Mabole.

Close to the Kerawalapitiya highway terminal which is to be completed by 2020.

Easy access to schools (St.Anne's, Lyceum, OKI, York International, Atamie) ,Hospitals (Hemas), Banks (CDB, Union, HNB, BOC, HSBC, NSB, People's Bank, Sampath & Commercial Bank) & super markets (Cargils, Arpico, Keels & much more)

- Four bedrooms
- One bathroom
- Small store room
- Living and dining areas
- Kitchen with wooden pantry cupboards
- Large and spacious garden
- Separate servant toilet
- Ample parking for three vehicles

QUICK SALE - Viewings can be arranged by appointment.
